El Kabron x IOC

Content Creation & Marketing Proposal

Oh hey El Kabron. Let's make some magic together.

We've got a vision.


We want to help you position El Kabron as the premier ocean-front destination for fine dining and exclusive relaxation. We'll help you reflect the incredible experience you offer through your content and social media, and attract the right target audience.

WHO WE ARE

Tina May is a marketer and entrepreneur that has helped businesses all over the world attract their ideal client, and boost sales through their websites, social media and digital marketing.

Emilio, also known as Eyes of a Nomad is a content creator from Melbourne Australia currently living the dream in Bali, Indonesia. He helps brands capture the essence of their personality and really tell a story through photography & videography.

Together, we grew Institute of Code from zero to over 500 students in less than 4 years, and now work along side other experts in the field to teach our students how to build thriving careers in social media & content creation.

Our Experience

We've worked with luxury hotels, villas, restaurants and bars around the world, as well as international fashion labels and product based brands. Just to name a few ...

  • La Lunia Liveaboad (Luxury Komodo Cruises)
  • Uluwatu Surf Villas
  • Opia Restaurant & Bar

  • Mrs Sippy Pool Bar
  • The Aya Niseko (Luxury Hotel in Japan)

  • Uma & Leopold (Luxury Fashion Brand)

We have the experience and enthusiasm to help you take the El Kabron brand to the next level.

Our Pitch

We offer full-service content creation and social media management to take the pressure off your in-house team and ensure you are meeting the quality standards required to position El Kabron as a premium brand.

  • Professional content creation (photography & videography) monthly for social media and web use
    + $650 per month
  • Social Media Management (Instagram + Facebook)
    + $350 per month

Content Creation

Each month we will capture professional photos and short videos to provide enough content for you to fill your social media and website, and reflect the premier experience of El Kabron. This package includes full planning and coordination of each shoot, the photography itself and professional editing to suit your aesthetic.

Content will be shot on a Canon 5D MkIII camera, Mavic Pro Drone, and Crane 2 Stabiliser (for smooth video).

If you decide to use any professional models and/or hair and makeup artists we can organise this for you (model fees to be paid directly).

  • 30 high resolution edited photos
  • 6x short (5 - 15 second) cinematic videos
  • BONUS: Behind the scenes stories on @eyesofanomad to 27k followers.

Social Media Management

Each month we would take the content we have shot and schedule it all for you in an instagram management tool (we recommend Planoly) creating a beautiful cohesive grid. Then we would draft engaging captions, and add relevant hashtags and location tags.

This discounted package is available as an add-on to monthly content creation.

  • 30 posts per month scheduled to both Facebook & Instagram
  • Creation of a beautifully cohesive grid
  • Writing engaging captions
  • Hashtag research & strategy
  • Scheduled for automatic posting

Let's Talk

We'd love to discuss your brand and needs further. Send us an email and let's get the ball rolling.
